name: Space Surfer
description:
Avoid asteroids while surfing through space!

As you play, you advance through levels, increasing the difficulty with each one. Try to reach the highest level you can!

Controls:

Move Up: W / Up Arrow

Move Down: S / Down Arrow

PLEASE NOTE: The music track currently doesn't play in Safari. For a better listening experience, please use Google Chrome or another browser. Hopefully this will be sorted out soon.
